items.sentence: I think Tom enjoys studying French, but I'm not sure.
I dream of visiting Australia someday with my family.
It's not uncommon to hear wolves howling around here.
I don't think Tom would ever say something like that.
I don't feel that my endeavors have been appreciated.
I tried to make an inconspicuous exit from the party.
I was asked to sit on the platform with the speakers.
I copied down several useful references on gardening.
I spotted you in the crowd as soon as I saw your hat.
I didn't expect to run into you in a place like this.
It's absolutely necessary for us to leave right away.
Please translate the following sentences into French.
Layers of sediment lay at the bottom of the riverbed.
I don't think that Tom knows where Mary wanted to go.
There's still some coffee left. Would you like a cup?
How much time do you spend each week studying French?
How old were your grandparents when they got married?
Tom became jealous when he saw Mary with another man.
If it's all right with you, I'll go home early today.
Tom was sitting on a tree stump with Mary on his lap.
Tom was killed in a hit-and-run accident last Monday.
Tom spent all afternoon talking to John's girlfriend.
Tom says he's going to turn himself in to the police.
Tom often reads the newspaper while eating breakfast.
Tom read the billboards as he drove down the highway.
I was surprised to hear Tom agreed to Mary's demands.
Tom sat in his rocking chair, staring out the window.
I love to spend time trying to put together a puzzle.
India is one of the world's most populated countries.
Tom is likely to be one of the last people to arrive.
Little does he realize how important this meeting is.
Will you help me pick out a tie to go with this suit?
Having met the girl before, I recognized her at once.
The mountain is covered with snow all the year round.
We have to look into the disappearance of the doctor.
The Tigers lost the game, which was a surprise to us.
A few years ago, our room had little furniture in it.
There seems to be something wrong with our telephone.
This place brings back many memories of my childhood.
What did you expect? French isn't my native language.
The man over there feeding pigeons is my grandfather.
I'm sure Tom would've told me if he'd known about it.
I'm in the middle of something. Can you call me back?
I'm not flexible enough to sit in the lotus position.
I'm sure that tomorrow I'm not going to pass my exam.
Hunger is what drove Tom to steal from his neighbors.
I had no idea that you were planning to go to Boston.
I'm too cheap to play anything but homebrew PC games.
The girls you were talking to used to be my students.
As is often the case with teenagers, she's conceited.
